meanings.definition: The quality or state of being spontaneous.
meanings.sent1: Her spontaneousness always brought joy to the group.
meanings.sent2: I admire the spontaneousness of his decision to travel the world.
meanings.sent3: The spontaneousness of the puppy's playful antics made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The garden bloomed with the spontaneousness of a wild meadow.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the essence of spontaneity and spontaneousness in her painting.

meanings.definition: The act or process of occurring without external stimulus or cause.
meanings.sent1: The sudden spontaneousness of the rain surprised us all.
meanings.sent2: The spontaneousness of the applause filled the room after the performance.
meanings.sent3: The spontaneousness of the fire alarm going off during the meeting was quite unexpected.
meanings.sent4: His laughter erupted with the spontaneousness of a volcano.
meanings.sent5: The spontaneousness of the shooting star left us in awe of the universe.
